segments.text: Excuse me , is this personnel division ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I came about your advertisement for a senior production planner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have been in Peking University , hadn't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What degree do you have now ? :
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any experience in this field ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I worked at AB Company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why are you interested in the position ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because you need a senior production planner who is good at mathematics and fluent in English . I think I am fit for the position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . If we decide to hire you , we'd pay you 5,000 yuan a month at the start . How do you think about it ?
segments.speaker: S2
